channel.title: 562 - 659 error
channel.description:
Hi this is on a rs2hd base,
I converted my 562 from jdk6 to jdk7
i had to add certain coding into npc.java and some others.
but now after i converted it All my players are now nulled.
if you delete a charecter and remake it as soon as u log out you cant log in again it says "error loading your profile please contact customer support"
aswell as all my NPC's at home has dispeard...
here is the error in my vps [code]com.rs2hd.net.ActionSender.sendCoords(ActionSender.java:2353) com.rs2hd.net.ActionSender.sendDestroyGroundItem(ActionSender.java:2371) com.rs2hd.util.ItemManager.refresh(ItemManager.java:129) com.rs2hd.util.ItemManager.createDropGroundItem(ItemManager.java:62) com.rs2hd.model.NPC.npcDied(NPC.java:195) com.rs2hd.model.NPC.giveSlayer(NPC.java:655) com.rs2hd.content.DeathEvent.execute(DeathEvent.java:100) com.rs2hd.event.Event.run(Event.java:65) com.rs2hd.model.World$1.run(World.java:179) com.rs2hd.Server$2.run(Server.java:145) java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.access$301(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
If anyone can help it would be a big help,
Thank you.

item.title: 562 - 659 error
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

I’m too tired to really find the problem, but I guess when you changed the constructors in the files you said you changed, it messed up player loading. Run the base in Eclipse and see if you get dangerous errors.

Read full topic

item.title: 562 - 659 error
item.dc:creator: @macca4g macca4g
item.description:
@macca4g wrote:

Hi this is on a rs2hd base,

I converted my 562 from jdk6 to jdk7

i had to add certain coding into npc.java and some others.

but now after i converted it All my players are now nulled.

if you delete a charecter and remake it as soon as u log out you cant log in again it says “error loading your profile please contact customer support”

aswell as all my NPC’s at home has dispeard…

here is the error in my vps com.rs2hd.net.ActionSender.sendCoords(ActionSender.java:2353) com.rs2hd.net.ActionSender.sendDestroyGroundItem(ActionSender.java:2371) com.rs2hd.util.ItemManager.refresh(ItemManager.java:129) com.rs2hd.util.ItemManager.createDropGroundItem(ItemManager.java:62) com.rs2hd.model.NPC.npcDied(NPC.java:195) com.rs2hd.model.NPC.giveSlayer(NPC.java:655) com.rs2hd.content.DeathEvent.execute(DeathEvent.java:100) com.rs2hd.event.Event.run(Event.java:65) com.rs2hd.model.World$1.run(World.java:179) com.rs2hd.Server$2.run(Server.java:145) java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.access$301(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source) java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

If anyone can help it would be a big help,

Thank you.
